TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable NoStartupFormException extends System.Exception

summary.span: 当未设置 属性时，Visual Basic 应用程序模型会引发此异常。

span.span: This exception is thrown by the Visual Basic Application Model when the property has not been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Visual Basic 应用程序模型时，需要应用程序设置属性在运行前的方法。The Visual Basic Application Model requires that the application set the property before running the method. 如果未设置的属性，Visual Basic 应用程序模型将引发此异常。If the property is not set, the Visual Basic Application Model raises this exception. 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展 Visual Basic 应用程序模型](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/customizing-extending-my/extending-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Extending the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/customizing-extending-my/extending-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). > [!NOTE] > 有关如何使用设置启动窗体信息**项目设计器**，请参阅[应用程序页，项目设计器 (Visual Basic 中)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)。For information about how to set the startup form by using the **Project Designer**, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Visual Basic 应用程序模型时，需要应用程序设置属性在运行前的方法。The Visual Basic Application Model requires that the application set the property before running the method. 如果未设置的属性，Visual Basic 应用程序模型将引发此异常。If the property is not set, the Visual Basic Application Model raises this exception. 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展 Visual Basic 应用程序模型](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/customizing-extending-my/extending-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Extending the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/customizing-extending-my/extending-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |-|-| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||本地化的错误消息字符串中。The localized error-message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

span.span: A message that describes the error.

summary.span: 用指定的错误消息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 参数的内容应为人所理解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 继承自 。 inherits from . 此构造函数设置的属性对象下表中所示。This constructor sets the properties of the object as shown in the following table. |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |-|-| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)| ||`message`字符串。The `message` string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyspecialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Protected Sub New (info As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

param.name: info
param.span: 存放有关所引发异常的序列化对象数据的 对象。

span.span: The object that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.

param.name: context
param.span: 对象，它包含有关源或目标的上下文信息。

span.span: The object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.

summary.span: 用序列化数据初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception inner) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, inner As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: 描述该错误的 对象。

param.name: inner
param.span: 表示当前异常的产生原因的 对象。

span.span: The object that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 参数不是空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ），则在处理内部异常的 catch 块中引发当前异常。

span.span: If the parameter is not a null reference ( in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 参数的内容应为人所理解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性返回的相同值，如果传递到构造函数中，则为空引用属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |-|-| ||`inner`引用。The `inner` reference.| ||`message`字符串。The `message` string.|
